title: Validate if write connection fails to GEF, SMTP have metrics to send to prism
custom_steps:
- Simulate to FAIL connection to GEF either by blocking port 50051 or host resolution failure 
- Make few email transaction to update metrics 
- verify Failure to send data is logged in PRISM
- review stats UDP packets with tcpdump -A port 8141 | grep 'ns.service.smtp.dem.errors.gef_send'
custom_expected: - Review tcpdump is created to send prism metric sent using port 8141 to statsd-smtp.telegraf with Metric name as DEM
